#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>

using namespace std;

main()
{
	int t,count,i;
 
	unsigned long int n;
	scanf("%d ",&t);
	string s;
	while(t--)
	{
	//	printf("%d\n",t);
		count = 0;
		getline(cin,s);
		
		for(i=0;i<10;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='0')
			{
				
			printf("-----");
		    }
		    else if(s[i]=='1')
			{++count;
			printf(".----");
		}
			else if(s[i]=='2')
			{count = count + 2;
			printf("..---");
		}
			else if(s[i]=='3')
		{count = count + 3;
			printf("...--");
	}
			else if(s[i]=='4')
			{count = count + 4;
			printf("....-");
		}
			else if(s[i]=='5')
			{count = count + 5;
			printf(".....");
		}
			else if(s[i]=='6')
			{count = count + 4;
			printf("-....");
		}
			else if(s[i]=='7')
			{count = count + 3;
			printf("--...");
		}
			else if(s[i]=='8')
			{count = count + 2;
			printf("---..");
		}
			else if(s[i]=='9')
			{count = count + 1;
			printf("----.");
	        }
		}
		
		printf("\n%d\n",count);
		
		
	}
	return 0;
}
